definitions.definition: To supply ( farmland ) with water, by building ditches , pipes , etc.
examples: We need to irrigate the land before we plant the crops.

definitions.definition: To clean (a wound ) with a fluid .
examples: The nurse will show you how to irrigate the wound to prevent infection.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To supply ( farmland ) with water, by building ditches , pipes , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To clean (a wound ) with a fluid .
